install.name: Google Analytics Tracking Module
install.author: Estime Oy
install.description:
This module allows you to insert Google Analytics tracking code into your Joomla 1.5 as a module. You should use the debug position.

Set the module title to no and module published yes, other settings according to your needs. Refer our user guide or forum at http://www.estimetemplates.com

param.name: ucode
param.label: Analytics _uacct code
param.description: Analytics _uacct code E.g. UA-123456-1. You get this from Google, when you sign in Google Analytics and add new site profile.

param.name: udn
param.label: Analytics _udn site
param.description: Analytics _udn site name. Leave empty, if you don't know, what this is.

param.name: state
param.label: Module published?
param.description: You can set the module offline by choosing No.

param.name: https
param.label: https
param.description: Click this, if your site uses ssl. Also, change your error reporting level from Maximum to simple from Site > Global Configuration > Server tab.
